mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectComOvseaDlvCstPlcCnnc Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ COM_ID , OVSEA_DLV_CST_PLC_SN , USE_YN , REGTR_ID , REG_DT , UDTER_ID , UDT_DT FROM COM_OVSEA_DLV_CST_PLC_CNNC WHERE 1 = 1 AND COM_ID = #{comId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND OVSEA_DLV_CST_PLC_SN = #{ovseaDlvCstPlcSn,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
